General.Name: Brunswick Exploration Inc
General.Description: Brunswick Exploration Inc., a junior exploration and evaluation company, engages in acquiring, exploring, and evaluating mining property assets in Canada. The company primarily explores for lithium. It owns interests in mining claims, which are located in Quebec, Ontario, Saskatchewan, Newfoundland, Manitoba, New Brunswick, and Nova Scotia. Brunswick Exploration Inc. is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1100 Canadiens-de-MontrEal Avenue, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3B 2S2
